titles.title: Medicare Occupational Therapy Coverage Eligibility Act of 2003
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for eligibility for coverage of home health services under the Medicare Program on the basis of a need for occupational therapy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/16/2003--Introduced. Medicare Occupational Therapy Coverage Eligibility Act of 2003 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to repeal the need-based condition on eligibility for Medicare coverage of home health services with respect to occupational therapy (thus providing for eligibility for occupational therapy coverage of home health services without such condition).
